TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRelatedEnd

summary.span: 定義關聯性 (Relationship) 的一端。

span.span: Defines the end of a relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會針對在關聯中代表某一端的物件定義需求。 defines the requirements for an object that represents an end in an association. 此介面由實作類別。This interface is implemented by the class. 是基底類別和類別。 is the base class for the and classes. ## Examples 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)，這由產生[Entity Data Model 精靈](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832), which was generated by the [Entity Data Model Wizard](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5). 下列範例會將新`SalesOrderHeader`實體`Contact`實體。The following example adds new `SalesOrderHeader` entities to the `Contact` entity. 然後，它會取得所有相關的端從`Contact`實體並顯示關聯性名稱、 來源角色名稱和每個相關端的目標角色名稱。Then it gets all related ends from the `Contact` entity and displays relationship name, source role name, and target role name for each related end. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#irelatedend)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#irelatedend)]

summary.span: 將物件加入至相關端。

span.span: Adds an object to the related end.

summary.span: 將物件加入至相關端。

span.span: Adds an object to the related end.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將物件加入至相關端。The method adds an object to the related end. 相關端必須是 。The related end must be an . 當來源物件會實作中追蹤和，另外也會追蹤所加入的物件。When the source object implements and is being tracked in the , the object being added is also tracked. 類別會明確實作 方法。The class explicitly implements the method. 類別會使用這個實作。The class uses this implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 如果相關的端而參考的屬性不是`null`，這個方法會擲回的例外狀況。If the related end is an and the property of the reference is not `null`, this method throws an exception.

summary.span: 定義兩個所附加物件之間的關聯性。

span.span: Defines a relationship between two attached objects.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Attach(class System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships entity) cil managed

span.span: The object being attached.
must implement .

summary.span: 定義兩個所附加物件之間的關聯性。

span.span: Defines a relationship between two attached objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是用來定義同時附加至相同 執行個體之兩個物件之間的關聯性。The method is used to define a relationship between two objects that are both attached to the same instance. 類別會明確實作 方法。The class explicitly implements the method. 類別會使用這個實作來定義所附加來源物件與附加至集合之物件之間的關聯性。The class uses this implementation to define relationships between the attached source object and the object attached to the collection. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 附加和卸離物件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23)。For more information, see [Attaching and Detaching Objects](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23).

summary.span: 將一個或多個相關物件載入這個相關端中。

span.span: Loads the related object or objects into this related end.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Load` 呼叫可從相關端公開的導覽屬性明確載入相關的物件。`Load` is called to explicitly load related objects from a related end that is exposed by a navigation property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 載入相關物件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb896272(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb896272(v=vs.100)).

span.span: Loads the related object or objects into this related end with the default merge option.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作 的 方法。The class implements the method of . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 會呼叫來從導覽屬性所公開的相關端中明確載入相關的物件。 is called to explicitly load related objects from a related end exposed by a navigation property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 載入相關物件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb896272(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb896272(v=vs.100)). 方法會載入相關的物件資料來源是否是`true`。The method loads related objects from the data source whether or not is `true`.

remarks.format: ## Examples 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)，這由產生[Entity Data Model 精靈](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832), which was generated by the [Entity Data Model Wizard](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5). 下列範例會將新`SalesOrderHeader`實體`Contact`實體。The following example adds new `SalesOrderHeader` entities to the `Contact` entity. 然後，它會取得所有相關的端從`Contact`實體和關聯性名稱、 來源角色名稱和目標角色名稱的每個相關端的顯示。Then it gets all related ends from the `Contact` entity and displays the relationship name, source role name, and target role name for each related end. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SourceRoleName As String
public: property System::String ^ SourceRoleName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得位於關聯性來源端的角色名稱。

span.span: Gets the role name at the source end of the relationship.

value.span: 位於關聯性來源端的角色名稱。

span.span: The role name at the source end of the relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作屬性。The class implements the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 角色名稱由`Role`屬性的`End`概念模型中定義此關聯性的關聯中的項目。The role name is specified by the `Role` attribute of the `End` element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Association 項目 (CSDL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41)。For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作 屬性。The class implements the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 角色名稱由`Role`屬性的`End`概念模型中定義此關聯性的關聯中的項目。The role name is specified by the `Role` attribute of the `End` element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Association 項目 (CSDL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41)。For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).
